接口 TaskPanel

所有已知实现类:
Task1Panel2D, Task1Panel3D, Task2Panel, Task3Panel, Task4Panel
public interface TaskPanel
Interface defining the contract for all Task UI Panels in the Shapeville application. Any JPanel that represents a task screen should implement this interface to interact with the TaskManager.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    displayProblem(Problem problem)
    Displays a new problem on the task panel.
    String
    getPanelId()
    Gets the unique identifier for this task panel.
    void
    resetState()
    Resets the UI state of the task panel.
    void
    setTaskLogicCallback(TaskLogic logic)
    Sets the callback reference to the corresponding task logic.
    void
    showFeedback(Feedback feedback)
    Displays feedback to the user based on their answer.

  • 方法详细资料

    • displayProblem

      void displayProblem(Problem problem)
      Displays a new problem on the task panel.
      参数:
      problem - The Problem object containing the problem details.

    • showFeedback

      void showFeedback(Feedback feedback)
      Displays feedback to the user based on their answer.
      参数:
      feedback - The Feedback object containing the feedback message and correctness status.

    • setTaskLogicCallback

      void setTaskLogicCallback(TaskLogic logic)
      Sets the callback reference to the corresponding task logic. This allows the UI panel to notify the logic when user actions occur.
      参数:
      logic - The TaskLogic instance managing this task's logic.

    • getPanelId

      String getPanelId()
      Gets the unique identifier for this task panel. Used by MainFrame and TaskManager for CardLayout management.
      返回:
      The unique String ID of the panel.

    • resetState

      void resetState()
      Resets the UI state of the task panel. This method should clear any previous problem data, user input fields, and feedback messages. Called when moving to the next problem or navigating away from the panel.
